channel.title: Death fall doesn't kill
channel.description: On the part where you are jumping between two conveyors to avoid being crushed, I fell, and couldn't find my way back up. After a while I went back into the water and found out that I could swim through a crate, which leads me to believe that the area isn't meant to be explored and that the fall should have killed me. So, is this a bug or am I just an idiot for not being able to find the way out?

item.title: Death fall doesn't kill
item.dc:creator: OCDMonkey
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

there is a door down there. It’s not a death fall

Well, yah, there is a door down there, but that just leads to another room on the same level where I can’t find a way up. If you can say there is a way back up, I will continue looking, but for now it looks like a bug to me.

EDIT: Ok, I’m an idiot. =P there is a way out. Still, you shouldn’t be able to swim through the box.

Read full topic
